## ðŸŽ¯ WHAT IS SAGE?

SAGE is a collaborative digital environment where students and instructors can interact with the screen simultaneously.




## HOW TO LOGIN TO SAGE?

To get started with SAGE follow these simple steps:

- Go to the following website: https://sage3.sagecommons.org/

![](images/sagewebsite.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- Download the app! (Note: App might not work with IPads)
![](images/sagedownload.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- Select Virginia Tech as Hub
![](images/sagehub.jpg){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- Select log in with Google and login with your VT email address:
![](images/sagelogin.jpg){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

## JOINING A ROOM

There are multiple rooms in SAGE created by users. Follow the steps below to select get into the room of your choice. 

- Search your room in "Search available rooms" and join
![](images/joinroom.jpg){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- Here, I have joined the room PDN. Once you join the room. You select a specific board. Instructors can create multiple boards within their room. This might be relevant for different sections of their course.
![](images/sageboards.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- One you select a board, you will be able to see the main screen of SAGE!

![](images/boardscreen.jpg){fig-align="center" width="800px"}


- To get back to the home screen, please select the home button at the bottom of the screen.
![](images/sagehome.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
